thread.title: Mike Solomonov, movie star: 'In Search of Israeli Cuisine' to premiere
thread.title_full: Mike Solomonov, movie star: 'In Search of Israeli Cuisine' to premiere

author: Michael Klein
title: Mike Solomonov, movie star: 'In Search of Israeli Cuisine' to premiere
text:
Mike Solomonov, movie star: 'In Search of Israeli Cuisine' to premiere Updated: March 14, 2017 — 10:50 PM EDT 105 Share ’s restaurant scene since 1993 in his Inquirer column, “Table Talk,” and on his Philly.com blog, “The Insider.” 
In Search of Israeli Cuisine , in which Philly chef Michael Solomonov tours the nation to tell its story through people and food, is ready to reach theaters nationally after hitting the film-festival circuit. 
Zahav: A World of Israeli Cuisine. | Updated:
